title: Loving Hut - Pak Chong
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Thai, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Asian
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and more. Has Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: 249 / 1 Moo 1 Friendship Road, Tambon Klang Dong
